message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $18,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget considerations.  While I believe the product is worth more, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects its true value.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly negotiate the price down to $17,500?
